message:
You may recall when Kim Kardashian had her face injected with her own blood. 

Dubbed the ‘vampire facelift,’ the cutting-edge treatment was the talk of the town for its rejuvenating and anti-ageing results.
Now, the same procedure is available for your vagina but not for anti-ageing purposes.
What the ’O Shot’ promises to rejuvenate is your sex drive

As its nickname implies, the ‘vampire vagina injection’ involves a needle and a woman’s nether regions. 

At the beginning of the procedure, blood is taken from the arm and the cells with the richest growth factors are separated.

These cells are then injected into the clitoris and inside the vagina, reportedly forcing the body to produce new cells and restore sensation.

Speaking to The Mirror, patient Sophia* seemed a satisfied customer.

She said: “After two weeks… the intensity of my orgasm was like nothing I’d experienced before.
“The satisfaction I feel now is on a whole new level.”

According to Dr Sherif Wakil, a licensed O Shot practitioner, most patients can look forward to these results. 

However, it is important not to rely on the treatment as the only solution. 

Dr Wakil said: “About 85% of my patients report a big improvement in sexual satisfaction, but any underlying hormonal imbalances can continue to affect libido.
